transcript.title: Resignation of Daryl Melham as Caucus Chair
transcript.content:
Canberra

Daryl Melham has been an exceptional caucus chair, ensuring the smooth running of our caucus meetings for the past eight years.

Mr Melham has expressed a completely understandable desire to spend more time in his electorate as we head into an election year.

I thank him for his loyal service to the party in this role, and look forward to his continuing contribution inside and outside caucus.
